devdoc.details: Integrates with deployed Uniswap V4 PoolManager and Universal Router

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params.hooks: Hook contract address (use address(0) for no hooks)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._slippageTolerance: New slippage tolerance in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: UniswapV4SwapRouter

directPoolSwap(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Direct swap through PoolManager for advanced users

getQuote(address,address,uint256).notice: Get quote for swap through Quoter contract

hasPool(address,address).notice: Check if a pool is configured

initializePool(address,address,uint24,ui.notice: Initialize a pool with starting price

swapExactInputSingle(address,address,uin.notice: Execute a token swap with exact input through Universal Router

userdoc.notice: Production-ready token swap router using Uniswap V4 on Sepolia
